name: Optimus Bobo
description:
OPTIMUS BOBO

Bobo, Optimus Prime's cousin, wants to be strong like his pop relative. And it's up to you to lead him through the levels as he gains more and more powers. But there are those who will try to prevent you from reaching glory: evil, chubby, restless mustache men, terrible zombies and all sorts of pixel art devils (those are the worst).

This game was produced in 48 hours for the Kenney Jam 2022. The theme of the jam was "growth". It was my first time taking part in a game jam, so bear with me, you guys :)

CONTROLS

W/S, arrows -> Move character

Z/Space -> Jump

X -> Shoot

Lft Shift -> Run
